title: 话说mcbbs什么意思！
author: ALAW
txt_content:
我昨天刚Lv6
今早起来，两条消息，又降到Lv5！！！！！！！！！！！

replies.author: Rain99
replies.txt_content:
积分减少了吧- -

你用积分换金币了么

replies.author: Give1329582145
replies.txt_content: MC Minecraft简称。BBS就是论坛。不用谢
